text: "Buenos Amigos" () is a duet from American singer Selena and Salvadoran singer Alvaro Torres. The song became Selena's first number-one single. It peaked at number-one on the Billboard Hot Latin Tracks in 1992. Buenos Amigos peak at No. 1 The single "Como La Flor" (1992) became Selena's first solo artist single. == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1991 songs Category:Songs in Spanish
title: Buenos Amigos
